title: Bug 104630 - Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the Available Items sector.
EB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Expand the Data Source section by clicking the related icon.
2. Expected Result: Table icons and column icons should show up.
3. Actual Result: Column icons are not visible.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Expand the Data Source section.
4. Observe that the column icons are not visible.
